mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LOG WHERE TO_CHAR(DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILES VALUES(SEQ_FID.NEXTVAL, NULL, NULL, #{mNo}, NULL, NULL, 3, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, SYSDATE, 'Y', 3)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FILES WHERE M_NO = #{mNo} AND FILE_LEVEL = 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA VALUES(SEQ_QID.NEXTVAL, NULL, #{mNo}, 2, #{qCategory}, #{qContent}, NULL, SYSDATE ,NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT M_NAME, M_ID, M_NO, GENDER, M_BIRTHDAY, M_PHONE, M_EMAIL, M_CONN, CRE_STATUS FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN CREATOR USING(M_NO)

SELECT * FROM V_PROJECT JOIN MEMBER USING(M_ID) WHERE M_NO = #{getmNo}
AND P_END_DATE >= SYSDATE AND P_STATUS ='Y'
AND SYSDATE > P_END_DATE AND P_STATUS ='Y'
AND P_STATUS ='N'

SELECT * FROM P_LIKES_VIEW WHERE M_NO = #{getmNo}
AND P_END_DATE >= SYSDATE
AND SYSDATE > P_END_DATE
AND P_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM P_LIKES_VIEW WHERE M_NO = #{getmNo}
AND P_END_DATE >= SYSDATE
AND SYSDATE > P_END_DATE
AND P_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V_PROJECT JOIN MEMBER USING(M_ID) WHERE M_NO = #{getmNo}
SELECT * FROM P_LIKES_VIEW WHERE M_NO = #{getmNo} AND P_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM V_PROJECT JOIN MEMBER USING(M_ID) WHERE M_NO = #{getmNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(M_CONN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE TO_CHAR(P_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE TO_CHAR(QNA_ENROLLDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT NO FROM LOG WHERE TO_CHAR(DAY, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM')-1 ORDER BY DAY
SELECT NO FROM LOG WHERE TO_CHAR(DAY, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') ORDER BY DAY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE P_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE P_STATUS = 'Y' AND P_END_DATE > SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE SYSDATE > P_END_DATE
SELECT CRE_NO, CRE_NAME, M_ID, CRE_TYPE, CRE_PHONE, CRE_EMAIL, P_NO FROM CREATOR JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) JOIN PROJECT USING(CRE_NO)
SELECT * FROM V_PROJECT WHERE P_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT * FROM V_PROJECT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILES VALUES(SEQ_FID.NEXTVAL, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{conNo}, NULL, 4, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, SYSDATE, 'Y', 2)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE QNA_TYPE = 2

SELECT DISTINCT M_NO, M_NAME, M_ID, GENDER, M_BIRTHDAY, M_PHONE, M_EMAIL, M_CONN, CRE_STATUS FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN CREATOR USING(M_NO)
CRE_STATUS IS NOT NULL
CRE_STATUS IS NULL
AND GENDER = 'M'
AND GENDER = 'F'
AND M_ID LIKE '%'||'${id}'||'%'
AND M_NAME LIKE '%'||'${name}'||'%'

SELECT CRE_NO, CRE_NAME, M_ID, CRE_TYPE, CRE_PHONE, CRE_EMAIL, P_NO FROM CREATOR JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) JOIN PROJECT USING(CRE_NO)
CRE_TYPE = 1
CRE_TYPE = 2
AND M_ID LIKE '%'||'${id}'||'%'
AND CRE_NAME LIKE '%'||'${name}'||'%'

SELECT * FROM V_PROJECT JOIN PRJ_CATE USING(PC_NAME)
PC_NO = ${pType}
AND P_STATUS = 'N'
AND P_END_DATE >= SYSDATE AND P_SUM_AMOUNT >= P_TARGET_AMOUNT
AND SYSDATE > P_END_DATE AND P_SUM_AMOUNT >= P_TARGET_AMOUNT
AND P_END_DATE >= SYSDATE
AND SYSDATE > P_END_DATE
AND SYSDATE > P_END_DATE AND P_TARGET_AMOUNT > P_SUM_AMOUNT
AND M_ID LIKE '%'||'${id}'||'%'
AND CRE_NAME LIKE '%'||'${name}'||'%'
AND P_TITLE LIKE '%'||'${pName}'||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE COMPETITION SET CON_STATE = 'N' WHERE CON_NO IN(#{conNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMPETVIEW WHERE CON_STATE = 'Y'

SELECT DISTINCT M_NO, M_NAME, M_ID, GENDER, M_BIRTHDAY, M_PHONE, M_EMAIL, M_CONN, CRE_STATUS FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN CREATOR USING(M_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(M_CONN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT * FROM V_PROJECT WHERE TO_CHAR(P_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT * FROM QNA JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(QNA_ENROLLDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT * FROM QNA WHERE M_NO = #{getmNo} AND QNA_TYPE = 2
SELECT PC_NO, PC_NAME, COUNT(P_NO) FROM PROJECT RIGHT JOIN PRJ_CATE USING(PC_NO) WHERE SYSDATE > P_END_DATE GROUP BY PC_NAME, PC_NO ORDER BY PC_NO
SELECT PC_NO, PC_NAME, COUNT(P_NO) FROM PROJECT RIGHT JOIN PRJ_CATE USING(PC_NO) WHERE SYSDATE > P_END_DATE AND P_SUM_AMOUNT > P_TARGET_AMOUNT GROUP BY PC_NAME, PC_NO ORDER BY PC_NO
SELECT PC_NO, PC_NAME, COUNT(P_NO) FROM PROJECT RIGHT JOIN PRJ_CATE USING(PC_NO) WHERE SYSDATE > P_END_DATE AND P_TYPE = 1 GROUP BY PC_NAME, PC_NO ORDER BY PC_NO
SELECT PC_NO, PC_NAME, COUNT(P_NO) FROM PROJECT RIGHT JOIN PRJ_CATE USING(PC_NO) WHERE SYSDATE > P_END_DATE AND P_SUM_AMOUNT > P_TARGET_AMOUNT AND P_TYPE = 1 GROUP BY PC_NAME, PC_NO ORDER BY PC_NO
SELECT PC_NO, PC_NAME, COUNT(P_NO) FROM PROJECT RIGHT JOIN PRJ_CATE USING(PC_NO) WHERE SYSDATE > P_END_DATE AND P_TYPE = 2 GROUP BY PC_NAME, PC_NO ORDER BY PC_NO
SELECT PC_NO, PC_NAME, COUNT(P_NO) FROM PROJECT RIGHT JOIN PRJ_CATE USING(PC_NO) WHERE SYSDATE > P_END_DATE AND P_SUM_AMOUNT > P_TARGET_AMOUNT AND P_TYPE = 2 GROUP BY PC_NAME, PC_NO ORDER BY PC_NO
SELECT * FROM M_REVENUE
